Text:
i downloaded the torrent and got a folder with some weird files in it. What do i do with the files so i can watch the movie?

The files are *.VOB, *.BUP, *.IFO.
Open them with windows media player
ifo is the file type of dvd+r you must burn it this is not a avi file you can only play it if you burn it on a dvd+r disc.
